title: How to View Weekly Fitbit Stats

steps.title: Go to the Fitbit website.
steps.content: Go to the Fitbit website. Open a web browser and on the address bar, type in https://www.fitbit.com . Hit Enter and you’ll be taken to Fitbit’s website.

steps.title: Log in.
steps.content: Log in. Click the “Log In” button on the top right-hand corner of the web page to sign into your account. Enter your Fitbit account’s email and password on the text fields and hit the “Log In” button at the center of the page to be redirected to your Account Dashboard.

steps.title: View all logs recorded by your Fitbit tracker.
steps.content: View all logs recorded by your Fitbit tracker. To do this, select “Log” from the navigation tab on the upper portion of the Dashboard.

steps.title: Click on “Activities.
steps.content: Click on “Activities. ” You’ll find this option in the list of categories available inside the Log section.

steps.title: Select “Week” under the Activities tab.
steps.content: Select “Week” under the Activities tab. Here you’ll be able to view all your Fitbit stats on a weekly basis. This includes the steps you've taken, distances you've traveled, and calories you've burned.

steps.title: Log into your Fitbit account.
steps.content: Log into your Fitbit account. On your browser, go to www.fitbit.com, click “Log in” and type in your account details on the fields provided to access your Fitbit dashboard.

steps.title: View all logs recorded by your Fitbit tracker.
steps.content: View all logs recorded by your Fitbit tracker. To do this, select “Log” from the navigation tab on the upper portion of the Dashboard.

steps.title: Click on “Activities.
steps.content: Click on “Activities. ” You’ll find this option in the list of categories available inside the Log section.

steps.title: Click the date text field.
steps.content: Click the date text field. If you want to see your weekly stats for a specific period, click the date text field on the upper-right section of the Activities tab to expand its options.

steps.title: Enter the day where you want the log to begin.
steps.content: Enter the day where you want the log to begin. Do this on the “Start Date” text field.

steps.title: Enter the last day of the log.
steps.content: Enter the last day of the log. Do this on the “End Date” field.

steps.title: View the stats for that week.
steps.content: View the stats for that week. Click the “Go” button to display your stats for the specified dates you've selected.
